p: Through epidemiological week 4 of 2018, 2 182 DENV cases were reported, including 1 114 (51.0%; 95% CI: 48.9%–53.1%) without warning signs, 1 031 (47.7%; 95% CI: 45.1%–49.3%) with warning signs, and 37 (1.7%; 95% CI: 1.2%–2.3%) with severe dengue. Additionally, eight deaths due to DENV were reported.
